dialog: Hi Jamie. Thank you for your patience. I'm Dr. Williams and I'll be helping you today. Before we begin, do you mind the presence of my mentee? She's a student volunteer at the hospital who is shadowing me today.
Of course! I don't mind at all.
Thank you. So, according to your chart here, you've been experiencing frequent exhaustion and dizziness?
Yes. I haven't been as productive at work because of these things. It's very frustrating. :(
I understand, Jamie. Perhaps we can run some blood tests first, if that is okay with you. It's to see if anything seems amiss.
That sounds wonderful. Thank you so much!
Of course. Before we do so, I happened to notice that you selected 'male' on the form. Would that be incorrect?
No, it's correct. I identify as a man.
Oh I see. I'm sorry, I must've been mistaken then.

dialog: Are you on any hormonal treatments? Like testosterone injections?
No, I am not. I indicated I wasn't on any treatment in the patient form.
I understand. I just wanted to make sure.
